titles.title: You Parents Hear What Jesus Taught

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: You parents, hear what Jesus taught When little ones to him were brought: Forbid them not, but heed my plea Permitting them to come to me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Obey your Lord and let his truth Be taught your children in their youth That they in church and school may dwell And learn their Savior's praise to tell.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: For if you love them as you ought, To Christ your children will be brought. If thus you place them in his care, All in your family well shall fare.
